January 14, 1969
Mr. Warren A# Kraetzer
General Manager, WUHY
4548 Market Street
Philadelphia, Pennsylvania 19139
Dear Warren;
As discussed in the November 8, J.968 meeting at
WNYC, New York and as described by Hartford Gunn’s
proposal, a National Public Radio System has much
to commend it*
The National Association of Educational Broadcasters
and its National Educational Radio Division have not
yet taken an official position regarding the* model.
Attached is reaction prepared by the NER Executive
Director. It is hoped that other participants in the
November 8 conference will react to the proposal
and that meaningful discussions concerning an inter¬
connected radio network will continue.
NER would appreciate receiving copies of any comments
made concerning the attachment or Hartford Gunn’s
proposal.
Sincerely,
Robert A. Mott
